Name: amowner
Description: User ID of the owner (currently not used)

Name: amstrategies
Description: Number of operator strategies for this access\n method

Name: amsupport
Description: Number of support routines for this access\n method

Name: amorderstrategy
Description: Zero if the index offers no sort order, otherwise the\n strategy number of the strategy operator that describes the sort order

Name: amcanunique
Description: Does the access method support unique indexes?

Name: amcanmulticol
Description: Does the access method support multicolumn\n indexes?

Name: amindexnulls
Description: Does the access method support null index\n entries?

Name: amconcurrent
Description: Does the access method support concurrent\n updates?

Name: amcostestimate
Description: Function to estimate cost of an index scan
